00020         namespace detail
00021         {
00022 
00024 
00025                 template <class T>
00026                 class no_refcnt_ptr: public T
00027                 {
00028                 private:
00029                         virtual unsigned long AddRef() = 0;
00030                         virtual unsigned long Release() = 0;
00031                 };
00032 
00034 
00035                 static inline IUnknown* _ComPtrAssign(IUnknown** pp, IUnknown* lp)
00036                 {
00037                         if (lp != 0) lp->AddRef();
00038                         if (*pp) (*pp)->Release();
00039                         *pp = lp;
00040                         return lp;
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 static inline IUnknown* _ComQIPtrAssign(IUnknown** pp, IUnknown* lp, SF_RIID riid)
00044                 {
00045                         IUnknown* pTemp = *pp;
00046                         *pp = 0;
00047                         if (lp != 0) lp->QueryInterface(riid, reinterpret_cast<void**>(pp));
00048                         if (pTemp) pTemp->Release();
00049 
00050                         return *pp;
00051                 }
00052 
00053         } // detail
00054

00057 
00058 
00060 
00061         template <class T>
00062         class com_ptr_impl
00063         {
00064         protected:
00065                 T* p;
00066 
00067         public:
00068                 typedef T                                                       interface_type;
00069                 typedef T*                                                      pointer_type;
00070                 typedef detail::no_refcnt_ptr<T>*       safe_pointer_type;
00071 
00072 
00074                 com_ptr_impl() : p(0) { }
00075 
00077                 com_ptr_impl(T* lp) : p(lp) { if (p != 0) p->AddRef(); }
00078 
00080                 com_ptr_impl(const com_ptr_impl<T>& other) : p(other.p) { if (p != 0) p->AddRef(); }
00081 
00083                 ~com_ptr_impl() { if (p) p->Release(); }
00084 
00085 
00086 
00088                 operator T*() const { return p; }
00089 
00091                 T& operator*() const { ASSERT_STRICT(p!=0); return *p; }
00092 
00094                 T** wrapped() { ASSERT_STRICT(p==0); return &p; }
00095 
00097                 safe_pointer_type operator->() const { ASSERT_STRICT(p!=0); return (safe_pointer_type)p; }
00098 
00100                 bool operator!() const { return (p == 0); }
00101 
00103                 bool operator<(T* pT) const { return p < pT; }
00104 
00106                 bool operator==(T* pT) const { return p == pT; }
00107 
00109                 bool operator!=(T* pT) const { return !operator==(pT); }
00110 
00112                 T* operator = (T* lp)
00113                 {
00114                         if(*this != lp)
00115                                 return static_cast<T*>(detail::_ComPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&p, lp));
00116                         return *this;
00117                 }
00118 
00120                 T* operator = (const com_ptr_impl<T>& lp)
00121                 {
00122                         if(*this != lp)
00123                                 return static_cast<T*>(detail::_ComPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&p, lp));
00124                         return *this;
00125                 }
00126 
00127 
00129                 void Release()
00130                 {
00131                         T* pTemp = p;
00132                         if (pTemp) {
00133                                 p = 0;
00134                                 pTemp->Release();
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137 
00139                 void Attach(T* p2) { if (p) p->Release(); p = p2; }
00140 
00142                 T* Detach() { T* pt = p; p = 0; return pt; }
00143         };
00144

00149         template <class T>
00150         class com_ptr : public com_ptr_impl<T>
00151         {
00152         public:
00153                 typedef T                                                       interface_type;
00154                 typedef T*                                                      pointer_type;
00155                 typedef detail::no_refcnt_ptr<T>*       safe_pointer_type;
00156 
00157                 com_ptr() { }
00158                 com_ptr(T* lp) : com_ptr_impl<T>(lp) { }
00159                 com_ptr(const com_ptr<T>& other) : com_ptr_impl<T>(other) { }
00160 
00162                 com_ptr(IUnknown* pUnk)
00163                 {
00164                         if (pUnk)
00165                                 pUnk->QueryInterface(uuid_of(T), (void **)&this->p);
00166                 }
00167 
00169                 template<typename Q>
00170                 com_ptr(const com_ptr<Q>& other)
00171                 {
00172                         if (other)
00173                                 other->QueryInterface(uuid_of(T), (void **)&this->p);
00174                 }
00175 
00177                 T* operator = (IUnknown* lp)
00178                 {
00179                         if(*this != lp)
00180                                 return static_cast<T*>(detail::_ComQIPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&this->p, lp, uuid_of(T)));
00181                         return *this;
00182                 }
00183 
00185                 template <typename Q>
00186                 T* operator = (const com_ptr<Q>& lp)
00187                 {
00188                         if(!Equal(lp))
00189                                 return static_cast<T*>(detail::_ComQIPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&this->p, lp, uuid_of(T)));
00190                         return *this;
00191                 }
00192 
00194                 bool Equal(IUnknown* pObj);
00195         };

00205         template<>
00206         class com_ptr<IUnknown> : public com_ptr_impl<IUnknown>
00207         {
00208         public:
00209                 typedef IUnknown                                                        interface_type;
00210                 typedef IUnknown*                                                       pointer_type;
00211                 typedef detail::no_refcnt_ptr<IUnknown>*        safe_pointer_type;
00212 
00213                 com_ptr() { }
00214                 com_ptr(IUnknown* lp) : com_ptr_impl<IUnknown>(lp) { }
00215                 com_ptr(const com_ptr<IUnknown>& other) : com_ptr_impl<IUnknown>(other) { }
00216 
00217                 template <typename Q>
00218                 IUnknown* operator = (const com_ptr<Q>& lp)
00219                 {
00220                         if(!Equal(lp))
00221                                 return detail::_ComQIPtrAssign(&p, lp, uuid_of(IUnknown));
00222                         return *this;
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 bool Equal(IUnknown* pObj)
00226                 {
00227                         return p == pObj;
00228                 }
00229         };
00230 
00231 
00232 
00233         template<class T>
00234         bool com_ptr<T>::Equal(IUnknown* pObj)
00235         {
00236                 if (this->p == 0 && pObj == 0)
00237                         return true;
00238 
00239                 if (this->p == 0 || pObj == 0)
00240                         return false;
00241 
00242                 com_ptr<IUnknown> punk1;
00243                 com_ptr<IUnknown> punk2;
00244                 this->p->QueryInterface(UUID_PPV(IUnknown, punk1.wrapped()));
00245                 pObj->QueryInterface(UUID_PPV(IUnknown, punk2.wrapped()));
00246                 return punk1 == punk2;
00247         }

00261 module::HResult create_instance(module::com_ptr<Itf>& ptr)
00262 {
00263         return Impl::_ObjectClass::_CreateInstance(UUID_PPV(Itf, ptr.wrapped()));
